title: To Begin Again
description: 2011 Next Generation Indie Book Award WINNER, Short Fiction.2011 Readers Favorite Award WINNER, Women's FictionTo Begin Again is a collection of short stories and narrative essays. Each piece herein focuses on those small decisions that can, often unexpectedly, lead to monumental transitions in a person's life. Knox examines the beauty of unexpected and unconventional romance, the connections that keep us near our family despite distance, and the delicate shift between anger and acceptance. This collection is eclectic, but within each story there is a balance of grittiness and inspiration that will stay with a reader long after the last page.
author: Jen Knox
